abstract.original_text: The interactions between proteins and membranes play critical roles in signal transduction, cell motility, and transport, and they are involved in many types of diseases. Molecular dynamics (MD) simulations have greatly contributed to our understanding

sentences.segment_text: The interactions between proteins and membranes play critical roles in signal transduction ,
and they are involved in many types of diseases .
Molecular dynamics ( MD ) simulations have greatly contributed to our understanding
